known.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: used about something that people know about or have discovered
known.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: a study of all the known facts
Apart from vaccines, there is no known way to protect against meningitis.
known.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a known criminal, drug dealer etc is someone who people know to be regularly involved in criminal activities or to do other things that are disapproved of
known.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: He was found with several other known sex offenders.
